name: Doc
description:
Welcome to Doc.

Doc in his adventure against Mr Wipe, the evil toilet roll genius.

Smack, Grab and Fly with Toilet Roll in this unusual yet highly fun and addictive platformer.

This game was created by Angry Caterpillar Team 2 - A new team formed for the Quarantine Game Jam and what a fantastic job they have done in the time given.

Angry Caterpillar™ - Lead Developer
https://angrycaterpillar.com/

Alex - Programmer
https://alex-dev.itch.io/

Redsti - Programmer
https://redsti.itch.io/

JayZFn - 2D Pixel Artist
https://jayzfn.itch.io/

Thank you for your support. We look forward to your votes and are sure that you will enjoy this game.
